attributes.action: Allow Secondary School Students to leave school for lunch.
attributes.additional_details: Other School Are allowed to leave school at lunch
attributes.background:
Secondary school pupils to be allowed off site at lunch.
To get lunch and not have to have school lunch, that has been frozen then deforest! Its not nice food and we would like to put a stop to it.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an decision for your school. You could raise this with your school's governing body.

If you would like Parliament to change the law, to require all secondary schools to allow their students to leave at lunchtime, you could start a new petition asking for that.
